N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 524.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) Providers operated or licensed by the Office: The provisions
of this Part apply to all mental health providers operated or licensed by the

Office, with the exception of secure treatment facilities established pursuant
to Article 10 of the Mental Hygiene Law, and programs operated by the Office
which are located in facilities operated by the Department of Corrections and

Community Supervision, which shall report, investigate, and review incidents in
accordance with policies of the Office. (b) For providers of mental health services
not subject to this Part, the Office may establish incident reporting standards
as a term and condition of the receipt of funding from, or other approval by, the Office to provide such services. (c) This Part is controlling over any other

Part of this Title governing the reporting, investigation or review of
incidents in those mental health facilities or programs subject to this

Part. Notes
